name: Mergulho
description: The Mergulho series consists in the investigation of feelings, sensations and personalities that emerge and are intensified by the period of social isolation. A personal dive into oneself in search of self-knowledge.  The paintings give voice, color and texture to internal conflicts, bringing to light the ugly, the fear and insecurities that are evoked by this moment. They reveal weaknesses, contradictions and the multiplicity of desires.  The bluish and vibrant tones create a reference to the abyssal, the deep and invites everyone to dive into the soul and to encounter each other in the uncertainty.
